headMarkup:
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/study/resource/QUTMainCSS/QUTMainCSS.css"/>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://use.typekit.net/hbv2spc.css">
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://www.qut.edu.au/__data/assets/css_file_folder/0018/707013/global-2017.min.css?0.3.481" media="all">
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://www.qut.edu.au/__data/assets/css_file_folder/0010/786961/qutex.min.css?0.9.38" media="all">

<style>
    @font-face {
      font-family: "ProximaNova";
      src: url("/sfsites/c/resource/QUTCustomFont/ProximaNova/ProximaNova-Regular.ttf") format("TrueType");
    }

    @font-face {
      font-family: "ProximaNova-Bold";
      src: url("/sfsites/c/resource/QUTCustomFont/ProximaNova/ProximaNova-Bold.ttf") format("TrueType");
    }
    
    #secondary-qutex-nav ul li a {
    	margin-right: 1.3rem !important;
    }
    #secondary-qutex-nav ul li:last-child a {
    	margin-right: 0 !important;
    }
    @media only screen and (max-width: 1199px) {
    	#secondary-qutex-nav ul li a {
    		margin-right: 1rem !important;
    	}
    }    
</style>

<script src="https://kit.fontawesome.com/ef61aff3f9.js" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
<script src="https://www.qut.edu.au/study/professional-and-executive-education/configuration/integrations/polyfills.js"></script>
<script src="https://www.qut.edu.au/study/professional-and-executive-education/configuration/integrations/QUT-2017-Javascript-Folder.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://www.qut.edu.au/study/professional-and-executive-education/configuration/integrations/qutex-javascript.js"></script>


<script>
    
QUT.Console.enable();

var initHeader = function(){
    console.log("document ready");
    // Set the call button for QUTex
    $('.header__links__contact').attr("href","#");
    $('.header__links__contact').on('click', function(){
        if($(window).width() < 767){
            // perform call
            window.location.href = "tel: +61 7 3138 7733"
        }else{
            // Link to Contact Page
            window.location.href = "https://www.qut.edu.au/about/contact";
        }});

    QUT.Megamenu.init();
    console.log("mega init");

    $(".header .megamenu__overlay").css("top","205px !important");

    function toggleFatFooterTab(e) {
        console.log("fat footer pressed");
    if ($('.fatfooter__content__wrapper').is(':visible')) {
        e.preventDefault();
        
        if (!$(this).hasClass('fatfooter__tab--current')) {
            $(".fatfooter__tab--current, .fatfooter__content--current").removeClass('fatfooter__tab--current fatfooter__content--current');
            $(this).addClass('fatfooter__tab--current');
            $('#' + $(this).data('tab')).addClass('fatfooter__content--current');
        }
    }
    }

    $(".fatfooter__tab").click(function(e) {
        toggleFatFooterTab.call(this, e);
    });
    
    let nav = "#secondary-qutex-nav";
    $(nav + " .qutex-nav-button").click(function(){
        $(nav + " ul").slideToggle();
        $(this).toggleClass("open")
        let ariaExpand = $(this).attr("aria-expanded")
        $(this).attr("aria-expanded", ariaExpand == "true" ? "false" : "true");
    });
}
    

let observer = new MutationObserver((mutations) => {
  mutations.forEach((mutation) => {
    if (mutation.addedNodes.length == 0) return

    for (let i = 0; i < mutation.addedNodes.length; i++) {
      let node = mutation.addedNodes[i]
        if(mutation.addedNodes[i].children != undefined && mutation.addedNodes[i].children.length > 0){
            var childrenList = mutation.addedNodes[i].children;
            for(let x = 0; x < childrenList.length; x++) {
                if(childrenList[x] != undefined && childrenList[x].className == "qutex-courses qutex-update-2021   animated-page"){
                    setTimeout(function(){
                        initHeader();
                    },250);
                    observer.disconnect(); 
                }
            }
        }
    }
  })
})

$(document).ready(function(){
    observer.observe(document.body, {
        childList: true
      , subtree: true
      , attributes: false
      , characterData: false
    })
    setTimeout(function(){
        // stop watching using:
        observer.disconnect()
    },10000)
})

</script>
label: main
